text:
Hi <@U02ATECP3DG>

I am Ayaz Madhiya from oApps Infotech, HubSpot Specialist and HubSpot Certified Developer from oApps Infotech. I have around 6 years of experience working with HubSpot and 12+ years of experience in Web Development.

I have expertise in developing email templates, landing pages, themes, blogs, and modules in HubSpot.

<https://devpost.com/software/twentyone-HubSpot-cms-theme>

In HubSpot I have the following expertise:
- HubSpot CRM Integration
- Creating Pipelines and Stages as per Business Needs
- Creating Customer Properties and using them to fulfill business needs.
- Create Workflow to make things automated so Marketing Team and other Sales Department can follow up with leads.
- HubSpot Landing Page Development
- HubSpot CMS Website Design
- HubSpot API Integration with third-party App.
- HubSpot App Development
- HubSpot Blog Development
- Create Automation tasks using webhooks and API
- Create Reports depending on the requirement and depending on departments.

You can see excellent reviews about my work in my HubSpot Profile:  <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/solutions/hub-devs>
My hourly rate is USD 25.

Thanks
<@U03788W8FFS> I would also definitely recommend <@UBT0AHWLD> he's a master at the CMS, and great at thoughtful design.
Hi <@U02DGJY44AV>, Excited to start working together!
